text: Terrestrial might mean: *In astronomy it means a rocky planet like the Earth, as opposed to a gas giant like Jupiter. Mercury, Venus, Earth and Mars are the terrestrial planets. *In ecology it means an area of land, as in terrestrial ecosystem. *In zoology, a terrestrial animal is one which lives on land. *In botany: growing in the soil, not (for example) epiphytic.
title: Terrestrial
